久しぶりにプレイ。キラー専です
いやーやっぱりクソですね！煽りプレイヤーばっかりだしキラーはどんどん弱体化されてかなり不利だしたまにチーター居るしでもう手が付けられません。
今からプレイするのは全くもってお勧めなどできません。
YouTubeで動画上げてる人はかなりのトッププレイヤーばっかりなので間違ってもあんなプレイ（キラー側）が出来るとは思わないように。しかも上げてるのは良い試合だけだし陰ではクソ試合も沢山あるでしょう。
重ね重ねになりますが煽り耐性のある人以外には全くお勧めできません

Хорошая игрушка. Можно смело покупать. С друзьями играть вообще одно удовольствие. Весело, прокачивай своего перса и вперёд. Правда очень редко попадаются читеры. В целом 8 из 10. Графика приятная, анимация на уровне.
Поверили ? А теперь по фактам. Баги ... сплошные баги . Оптимизация хромает но не суть. А вот геймплэй это пипец. Маньяк может попасть по тебе даже сквозь текстуру или из-за укрытия. Думаете это всё? Нееет. Сервера лагают будь здоров. Пинг часто за 200 . А ещё , хоть это и трудно доказать , это читеры. Ага , они и правда есть там. И анти-чит так себе видно робит. 
Итог : в целом то игра прикольная, но постоянные баги и лаги портят всё впечатление. По качеству игра посредствена. Объективная оценка 5из10. Убить время игрушка потянет. Рекомендовал бы? Ну возможно да. Но её надо фиксить , фиксить и ещё раз фиксить!

There are only a couple things wrong with this game and I will list them below.

1. Survivor Infinite Lobby Loading Glitch
     They need to fix this, I'm tired of restarting my game just for a chance to load into a lobby.
2. Killer Lobby Takes 5 Years to Get Survivors
     I don't know why it takes about 5 to 20 min, depends on the time of day I guess.

Yeah that's about it and I know I only have about 40 hours in this game. I started a bit before the halloween even ended, it was F2P for it and I like it so I bought it. Overall it's a great game. They just need to fix some bugs.

Oyunu ilk gördüğümde çok heyecanlanıp almıstım (panda ile boşluk harikaydı gaza geldim) başka bütün korku temalı oyunlardan sıyrılıyordu.
      Bi kere takım oyununa gerilim ve korku eklemişti ama solo da umduğumu bulamadım cabuk sıkıldım bunun sebebi tüm oyunlarda ortak sorun olan ne yaparsanız yapın kendını tekrar etmesı. istediğiniz karakteri geliştirin oyunda açılabılecek herşeyi yapın ve sonrası yok devam etmeniz için bir gereklilik yok sıze onu sunmuyor.
     Ama yok ben arkadaşlarımla arada bir girip takılıcam dersenız bir kaç saat keyifle oynayıp eğlence ve korkuyu tadıp çıkarsınız. 
Peki bu oyun alınırmı? 
Alınır (indirimde) ama benim yaptığım hatayı yapmamalısınız solo takılcaksanız uzak durun derim yoksa oyun listenizde ki tozlu raflarda yerini alır.

[h1] Dead Buy? Daylight [/h1] [i]...AKA How To Cut Onions Without Hurting Yourself[/i]

[b]If you hate reading as much as I do, you can watch a video review instead! Hurray Democracy![/b]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l81b7tgRVEE


[b]Dead by Daylight is truly the epitome of gaming.[/b] Before you think I’m being sarcastic [i]Brave Gamers[/i], let me explain my latest sentence. This game combines everything there is about video gaming as a [b]whole[/b]. It is a fun game by itself, but almost more importantly it is fresh and innovative and neigh genre defining if you ask me. 

[i]The gameplay is sort of like an onion of simplicity and depth.[/i] After you tell one of your friends about this game, and reassure them that no, playing a horrible murderer on a killing spree does not make me more violent MOM(!), it is quite simple to understand that the game is not so much about killing, but rather a trial of sacrifice and escape. The simple game mechanics are then further fused with the countless number of build combinations you can equip your surivor or killer with, and the online element means that no two games are ever the same. However, [i]and I don’t need to introduce you to this fact reader[/i]: The online element brings another disgusting disease into the equasion, by the common name of [b]TOXICITY[/b]. 

[h1]Dead by daylight is not only an onion by gameplay mechanics but also as a whole.[/h1] 

An onion is truly a great vegetable with a strong taste and a countless number of applications. On the other hand it is smelly and sometimes that taste is a little [i]too[/i] strong for my taste. DBD manages to swing me in both directions towards love and hate every single time I play. 
Now of course I’m a brand new player, a n00b by every meaning of the word, but that does not mean every single game should be painstakingly difficulty to do well in. I mostly played killer in my brief debut in DBD so I cannot tell you much about the survivor side, but man, did I experience the survivors [i]on an existential level[/i] as a killer (who are supposedly on the "same" rank as me, a new player.) 

After one or two fun matches trying to peel back that onion and learning a bit about the murdering profession, the stink of this magnificent [strike]fruit[/strike] vegetable will be unbearable, creating a toxic cloud of internet anonimity. Survivors fellow DBD players call [b]„Survivor Friends”[/b] who are generally on a voice chat outside the game have a massive advantage over [i]your average run of the mill Dwights or Megs.[/i] Not only do these survivors tend to be STEAM friends, but they also seem to be extremely experienced and optimal at the game, and they never forget to quickly T-bag you after a nasty pallet drop. They also seem to carry flashlights and bodyblock your struggle to get to a hook. [i]„A struggle you say 2SIDERS? Well shouldn’t the survivors struggle off of your manly shoulders when you are carrying them as a killer?”[/i] [b]Not in this game, Reader.[/b]

Maybe this is some sort of a perverted justice reflecting on the real world, but here the viscious cannibal and the hillbilly are the ones that get bullied into ragequitting life. They say you need to have a thick skin to be a celebrity or online persona, well luckily DBD prepares you for just the occassion. After around 7 hours of playtime my skin is like rhinoceros and my girlfriend calls me BUBBA. 

[h1]On a More Serious Note, in Conclusion...[/h1]

If you have anxiety of any shape or form or if you are a teddybear-boy type person in real life (don't worry I won’t tell anyone) [b]do NOT[/b] pick this game up. If you do decide to play this or you’re still contemplating ruining your emotional health, there are special weekends when you can play this game for free. 

Make sure to only buy it when it’s on sale every 2-3 months. A great pain of the gaming industry [i]and this part deserves its own review,[/i] is the countless number DLC content with the game that you have to buy [b]individually[/b], If you want to make it big in the [i]World of DeadbyDaylight[/i] otherwise known as WoB. [b]You will have to buy each and every DLC.[/b]

At higher ranks you will need all the good killer perks to even have the chance of hooking one of the four Claudettes in your game even just once. As a starter, I recommend buying the game + the halloween DLC.

With that being said, in the conclusion of the conclusion...it's a fun game on its own, unfortunately poisoned by the human condition. Games like Dead by Daylight will never be fixed* by the developers; we're too deep down the rabbit hole to make any serious changes that wouldn't anger the [i]Brave Gamers[/i]. The error lies in the basic game mechanics that sometimes encourage Camping, Tunneling and Bullying. As long as you don't feed the trolls and keep a nonchalant attitude about yourself, you will enjoy this game very very much.

I watched people playing this game on twitch a lot before even getting into it myself, I thought it was actually a horror game, but you know what, it's not! There are some balance issues, but the devs seem to do their best to try to get things right.

Even when you die as a survivor, or when all the survivors escape as killer, you still get some bloodpoints (this is what serves as experience/currency in the game to level up each survivor/killer). So even when you lose, you still manage to win a bit, and can level up your survivor or killer, which I liked. It's better than some other games where you get no experience.

The game still has a ways to go and is still going to be popular, at least until Last Year: The Nightmare comes out, and even then people who don't like first person shooters etc. will still stay in DbD.
